term.title: bar

item.text: Non-SI unit of pressure, bar = 10E5 Pa.

sources.item: PAC, 1996, 68, 957. 'Glossary of terms in quantities and units in Clinical Chemistry (IUPAC-IFCC Recommendations 1996)' on page 963 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199668040957)
